org.apache.flink.runtime.util

类 JarFileCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.util.JarFileCreator

  • public class JarFileCreator
extends Object
    This is an auxiliary program which creates a jar file from a set of classes.

    This class is thread-safe.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JarFileCreator(File outputFile)
      Constructs a new jar file creator.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      JarFileCreator addClass(Class<?> clazz)
      Adds a Class object to the set of classes which shall eventually be included in the jar file.
      JarFileCreator addPackage(String p)
      Manually specify the package of the dependencies.
      JarFileCreator addPackages(String[] packages)
      Manually specify the packages of the dependencies.
      void createJarFile()
      Creates a jar file which contains the previously added class.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • JarFileCreator

        public JarFileCreator(File outputFile)
        Constructs a new jar file creator.
        参数:
        outputFile - the file which shall contain the output data, i.e. the final jar file

    • 方法详细资料

      • addClass

        public JarFileCreator addClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Adds a Class object to the set of classes which shall eventually be included in the jar file.
        参数:
        clazz - the class to be added to the jar file.

      • addPackage

        public JarFileCreator addPackage(String p)
        Manually specify the package of the dependencies.
        参数:
        p - the package to be included.

      • addPackages

        public JarFileCreator addPackages(String[] packages)
        Manually specify the packages of the dependencies.
        参数:
        packages - the packages to be included.

      • createJarFile

        public void createJarFile()
                   throws IOException
        Creates a jar file which contains the previously added class. The content of the jar file is written to outputFile which has been provided to the constructor. If outputFile already exists, it is overwritten by this operation.
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs while writing to the output file
